goal: Deliver an end-to-end self-healing capability: telemetry → baseline → anomalies → diagnosis → SLO enforcement with rigorous BDD/TDD governance.
overarchingOutcomes: SLO breaches surfaced as first-class events

definitions.slice: A vertical increment delivering business-visible behavior validated by a business BDD test and at least one artifact.
ready: Business BDD spec updated (enforcement script passes)
Acceptance criteria captured (in backlog or sprint scope)
Dependencies identified (none blocking or mitigation listed)

sprints.name: Diagnosis Completion & Foundations
sprints.theme: Finish diagnosis stack and ensure solid enforcement & coverage base
acceptanceCriteria: All diagnosis handlers emit structured findings
Business BDD scenarios for new handlers added to spec

sprints.name: Adaptive Baseline & Initial SLO Signals
sprints.theme: Introduce baseline rebase and SLO configuration with raw SLI extraction
acceptanceCriteria: Rebase handler updates p50/p95 with exponential decay or rolling window
service_level.objectives.json committed with four core SLOs
SLI derivation produces latency_p95, error_rate, availability %, throughput
Business BDD tests for rebase + SLI extraction pass

sprints.name: SLO Breach Integration & Anomaly Fusion
sprints.theme: Detect SLO breaches and fold them into anomaly pipeline for unified signaling
acceptanceCriteria: SLO breach events emitted with severity classification
BDD scenarios for at least one breach & one non-breach

sprints.name: Governance & Enforcement Enhancements
sprints.theme: Harden spec enforcement and produce actionable drift telemetry
acceptanceCriteria: Version mismatch causes failure with rationale
Reverse mapping ensures no orphan spec entries
Drift report artifact produced on failure

cadence.standups: Daily 10m focus on blockers & slice readiness
cadence.demo: End of each sprint: run orchestrators + show new artifacts
